page.title: 03The Notley and the Community
page.content: The Notley has an important part to play in village life. It provides a focal point. There is not much other{entertainment}in and around the area. It provides part time {employment}for about ten people. Its position is used as a focal point for the{Village Fete. }On the Thursday we first visited there was a{Polling station for{Local Elections}in the Car Park. The few services that are afforded to Monksilver, the{travelling {library and the travelling fishmonger all stop at the Notley Arms once a week. All in all the Notley Arms is an important{social centre.
